property.title: AJAX Progress Indicator
property.description: This styles the element that appears when AJAX operations are in progress.

property.title: Alert Balloon
property.description: Controls the appearance of the balloons that appear above Inbox and Alerts in the navigation bar to indicate unread items.

property.title: Alert Balloon Arrow
property.description: Controls the appearance of the pointer-arrow attached to alert balloons.

property.title: Enable Animations, Using Multiplier:
property.description: If you enable animations, you can adjust the speed using the multiplier. 1: Normal speed, 0.5: double speed, 2: half speed etc.

property.title: Avatar
property.description: Controls the display of most avatars (user identity pictures) shown throughout the system.

property.title: BB Code Block
property.description: Controls the basic layout of a BB code block such as [quote] or [code].

property.title: BB Code Block Type Row
property.description: Styles the row in which the type of BB code is noted (HTML, Code etc.)

property.title: BB Code Pre / Code
property.description: Styles the area containing code such as [php], [html] and [code].

property.title: BB Code Quote
property.description: This definition is used together with the BB Code Block definition to provide styling for [QUOTE] blocks.

property.title: Quote Attribution Block
property.description: Controls the appearance of the attribution row that sits above a quoted message.

property.title: BB Code Quote Message
property.description: This styling applies to the message area of [QUOTE] blocks, styling the actual quoted message itself.

property.title: Body
property.description:
This property controls the CSS for the main <body> element of XenForo pages.
Primarily, it is used for text styling, which is inherited by almost all other elements within XenForo.

property.title: Container
property.description: Controls the container within which the breadcrumb sits.

property.title: Call-to-Action Button
property.description: Sometimes the top breadcrumb is associated with a call to action button. This property controls the container for that button.

property.title: Breadcrumb
property.description: Controls the main breadcrumb unit.

property.title: Board Title
property.description: You may optionally display the board title at the head of your breadcrumb.

property.title: Button
property.description: This property controls the .button class, which is used for form controls and action buttons throughout the system.

property.title: Call-to-Action Button Container
property.description: Controls the style of major call to action buttons such as 'Reply to Thread'.

property.title: Call-to-Action Button, Active State
property.description: Used to style the 'clicked' state of call to action buttons

property.title: Call-to-Action Button, Hover State
property.description: Used to style the mouse-over / hover state of call to action buttons.

property.title: Call-to-Action Button Inner
property.description: Controls the <span> inside call to action buttons

property.title: Category Strip
property.description: Applied to level one (no parent) categories. The majority of the styles for category strips come by default from the @subHeading style property.

property.title: Content
property.description:
The styling of the main page area is controlled with this property.
Its primary function is to provide the content background color.

property.title: Content Background
property.description: Main page background color

property.title: Content Text
property.description: Main text color

property.title: Control Unit
property.description: Controls the individual blocks around which forms in XenForo are built.

property.title: Controls Area
property.description: Styles the area containing the actual form controls and any explanation text within the control unit.

property.title: Control Explanatory Text
property.description: Styles longer explanatory text that may appear below form controls in control units.

property.title: Form Control Unit Edge Spacer
property.description: Defines a horizontal spacing either side of control units.

property.title: Label Area
property.description: Controls the area containing the label within the control unit.

property.title: Label Inline Errors
property.description: Controls the display of any inline validation errors that appear with form element labels.

property.title: Label Hints
property.description: Styles any supplementary text to accompany the label for form controls in the labels area.

property.title: Form Control Unit Label Width
property.description: Defines the width of the label area to the left of form control units.

property.title: Discussion Flag
property.description: Controls the appearance of flags / icons for discussions such as sticky, locked etc.

property.title: Discussion Starter Avatar
property.description: Controls the appearance of the avatar of the user who started the discussion.

property.title: Avatar Cell Width
property.description: Controls the width of the avatar cell.

property.title: First Row Text
property.description: Controls the display of text on the first row of discussion list items, including the title.

property.title: Item Page Nav Item
property.description: Controls individual items within the discussion page nav.

property.title: Item Page Nav Link, Hover State
property.description: Changes applied to page links on hover.

property.title: Last Message Cell Width
property.description: Controls the width of the 'last message' cell.

property.title: Mini-Me Container
property.description: Mini-Me is the small avatar of the current visitor that shows up on discussions in which the visitor has posted.

property.title: Mini-Me Image
property.description: Mini-Me is the small avatar of the current visitor that shows up on discussions in which the visitor has posted.

property.title: Options Panel Form
property.description: Controls the appearance of the display options panel that can appear below the discussion list.

property.title: Hide item page navigator unless hovered
property.description: This option allows the multi-page navigator shown on discussion list items with multiple pages to remain hidden until the item is moused-over.

property.title: Second Row Text
property.description: Controls the second row of text for discussion list items.

property.title: Stats Cell Width
property.description: Controls the width of the statistics cell.

property.title: Title (Unread)
property.description: Alters the display of discussion list item titles when they contain unread messages.

property.title: External Authentication Button Width
property.description: Controls the width of external authentication buttons such as 'Login with Facebook'.

property.title: Rich Text Editor Content
property.description: The content of the rich text editor should appear in the same colors, fonts etc. as your messages. If it does not, you can use this style property to tweak the appearance.

property.title: Enable Overlays
property.description: You may disable all overlays and instead load full pages by switching off this option.

property.title: Facebook Plugin Color Scheme
property.description: Choose a color scheme for all Facebook plugins in this style.

property.title: Feed Icon Path
property.description: Path to the RSS feed icon shown on forums.

property.title: Main Container
property.description: Controls the appearance of the container for the upper footer section.

property.title: Left Content Block
property.description: Styles the container of the style and language chooser trigger controls.

property.title: Link
property.description: Styling for links in the main header section

property.title: Link, Hover State
property.description: Styling to be added to links in the main footer section in their hover state.

property.title: Right Content Block
property.description: Styles the block of links usually shown on the right of the footer.

property.title: Form Control Unit Controls Indent Width
property.description: Defines the amount that controls should be indented from controls upon which they depend.

property.title: Text Control Placeholder Text
property.description: Styling for placeholder / prompt text in text controls.

property.title: Container
property.description: Controls the appearance of form-type overlays.

property.title: Button
property.description: Controls the appearance of buttons in form overlays.

property.title: Heading
property.description: Major headings within form-type overlays.

property.title: Label Hint
property.description: Styles any supplementary text provided for control labels etc.

property.title: Link
property.description: Styles links within form-type overlays.

property.title: Sub-Heading
property.description: Controls minor headings within form-type overlays.

property.title: Tab
property.description: Controls the appearance of individual tabs within form overlays.

property.title: Tab, Hover State
property.description: Controls hovered tabs on form overlays.

property.title: Tab Panel
property.description: Control the panel that sits below a collection of tabs in a form overlay.

property.title: Tabs Container
property.description: Controls the appearance of tabs within form overlays.

property.title: Text Control
property.description: Alters the appearance of text controls within form-type overlays.

property.title: Text Control, Disabled State
property.description: Controls disabled text controls in form overlays.

property.title: Text Control, Focus State
property.description: Controls text controls in form overlays when focused.

property.title: Text Control Placeholder Text
property.description: Controls the placeholder / prompt text within text controls in form overlays.

property.title: Text Heading
property.description: Controls textual headings within form-type overlays.

property.title: Form Width
property.description: Controls the width of forms using the .xenForm class.

property.title: Forum Icon Path - Read
property.description: Path the the icon shown for unread forums.

property.title: Page Title
property.description: This styles the <H1> page title.

property.title: Header
property.description: Styling for the header background

property.title: Height of Header Logo
property.description: Enter the height in pixels that you would like to reserve for the logo in the header.

property.title: Header Logo Image Path
property.description: This path describes the location of the main logo image used in the header of all pages.

property.title: Heading
property.description: Big, important headings

property.title: HTML
property.description: This property controls the browser background and text.

property.title: Path to Images
property.description: This path represents either the relative or absolute path to images used by the XenForo user interface. You may change this to point to a CDN if you wish.

property.title: Inline Moderation Checked
property.description: The values specified here will be applied to items selected for inline moderation.

property.title: Link
property.description: The default styling for textual hyperlinks.

property.title: Link Group Link
property.description: Individual links within link groups, as defined above.

property.title: Link Group Link Spacing
property.description: Controls the amount of separation between items in link groups.

property.title: Link (hover state)
property.description: Styles normal textual links when hovered.

property.title: Container
property.description: Controls the basic styling of the login bar.

property.title: Login Bar Collapsed Height
property.description: The height in pixels of the collapsed login bar.

property.title: Login Form
property.description: Controls the layout and appearance of the form element within the login bar.

property.title: Handle
property.description: Controls the appearance of the handle by which the login bar is activated.

property.title: Links
property.description: Textual hyperlinks within the login bar.

property.title: Text Control
property.description: Controls the appearance of text boxes in the login bar.

property.title: Text Control: Disabled State
property.description: Extra properties for text controls when disabled.

property.title: Text Control: Focus State
property.description: Extra properties for text controls when focused.

property.title: Text Control: Username
property.description: Additional properties to be applied to the login bar username input box.

property.title: Login button width
property.description: Minimum width of the primary log in button.

property.title: List Item Container
property.description: Controls the appearance of the container for member list items.

property.title: Avatar
property.description: This property applies to the user avatar shown in member list items.

property.title: Content Info
property.description: Sometimes, info about a post or thread etc. will be shown inside a member list item. This applies styling to that content.

property.title: Fixed column width
property.description: Width of fixed column in extended member list items.

property.title: Extra Content
property.description: On occasions, extra content is added to member list items. Use this to restyle it.

property.title: Username (Guests)
property.description: Applied in addition to the regular username styling.

property.title: User Info Container
property.description: Controls the style of the container for everything in the member list item except the user avatar.

property.title: User Info
property.description: This property is applied to the contain for all user info underneath the main username link.

property.title: User Title
property.description: User titles in member list items are styled with this property.

property.title: Username
property.description: Applies to the main username link on member list items.

property.title: Menu
property.description: The main container for the pop-up part of pop-up menus.

property.title: Menu Header Subtitle
property.description: The smaller text that sometimes appears below the main menu title.

property.title: Menu Header Title
property.description: The large text that appears at the top of pop-up menus.

property.title: Minimum Menu Height
property.description: The minimum height for pop-up menus.

property.title: Minimum Menu Width
property.description: Defines the minimum width for all pop-up menus.

property.title: Message Container
property.description: This element entirely surrounds each message.

property.title: Avatar Holder
property.description: Styles the block that surrounds the large avatar for a message author.

property.title: Main Content
property.description: This is used to enclose the message text and any other user-generated content for the message, such as attached files.

property.title: Extra User Info
property.description: Controls the appearance of the (optional) extra user info that can be displayed under the message poster's avatar and username.

property.title: Content Container
property.description:
This element contains the content area of the message template.
In the default style, it is used to enclose the right column of the message template, which contains the message text and controls.

property.title: Likes
property.description: This styles the block that displays the summary of users who have liked the message.

property.title: Message List
property.description: This is the container used for lists of messages.

property.title: Controls Area
property.description: This block sits below the main content area and includes the inline moderation checkbox, permalink and message controls.

property.title: Control
property.description: Defines the appearance of message controls such as Edit, Delete, Like, Reply.

property.title: Notices
property.description: Notices are used to display information such as the message being in the moderation queue, or being deleted.

property.title: 'Private' Controls Container
property.description: Container for controls generally seen only by privileged visitors - Edit, Delete, IP etc.

property.title: 'Public' Controls Container
property.description: Container for controls seen by general visitors - Like, Reply etc.

property.title: Show Author Gender
property.description: Show the gender of the message poster, if specified.

property.title: Show Author Homepage
property.description: Display a link to the homepage of the message author, if they have entered one.

property.title: Show Author Location
property.description: Show the message author's location, if they have provided one.

property.title: Show Author Message Count
property.description: Display the total number of messages posted by the message author.

property.title: Show Author Occupation
property.description: Show the message poster's occupation, if specified.

property.title: Show Author Registration Date
property.description: Display the date on which the message author signed up.

property.title: Show Author Total Received Likes
property.description: Display the total number of times content by the message author has been 'liked'.

property.title: Show Author Trophy Points
property.description: Display the message poster's total accumulation of trophy points.

property.title: Message Text
property.description:
The text shown in the body of full-size messages will be controlled by the values set in this property.
It does not apply to small messages, such as profile posts and comments, which use the text styling from 'body'.

property.title: User Info Block
property.description: This unit directly encloses the avatar, username and other user info for a message.

property.title: User Info Container
property.description:
This container encloses the avatar, username, user title and additional user info elements.
Its primary purpose in the default style is to provide the left column of the message template.

property.title: User Text Block
property.description: Styles the container for the author username and user title next to messages.

property.title: Author User Title
property.description: Controls the appearance of the user title displayed with the message poster's username.

property.title: Author Username
property.description: Styling for the name of the person who posted the message.

property.title: Navigation Tab
property.description: Controls each individual navigation tab link.

property.title: Selected Tab Sub-Link
property.description: Styles each link in the row of controls below the selected navigation tab.

property.title: Selected Tab Link, Hover State
property.description: Styles links under the selected navigation tab, in their hover state.

property.title: Selected Tab
property.description: Styles the currently-selected header navigation tab.

property.title: Navigation Tabs Container
property.description: Controls the container for the header navigation tabs.

property.title: Node Description
property.description: Controls the display of non-tooltip node description text.

property.title: Description Tooltip Arrow
property.description: The triangle / arrow attached to node description tooltips

property.title: Node Icon
property.description: Controls the large icon shown on forum, page and link nodes.

property.title: Node Last Post
property.description: This controls the block of info describing the last post made within a forum (usually) node.

property.title: Enable Forum Descriptions Tooltips
property.description: Show descriptions only when hovering over forum titles on the main node list.

property.title: Show Forum Descriptions on Node List
property.description: Include descriptions underneath node titles on the main node list.

property.title: Node Statistics
property.description: Controls the display of the total number of discussions, messages etc.

property.title: Node Text Block
property.description: This controls the area within which the main text for node display is contained.

property.title: Tiny Icon
property.description: This controls the appearance of small icons such as the RSS feed icon.

property.title: Tiny Icon - Hover
property.description: Changes to be made to tiny icons when the mouse moves over them

property.title: Node Title
property.description: Controls the display of non-category node titles

property.title: Node Title - Unread
property.description: Extra properties to apply to node titles when they contain unread content.

property.title: Facebook Open Graph Logo
property.description: This logo will be displayed in Facebook when a visitor likes a page on your site. Must be at least 50x50 and should be square.

property.title: Overlay Close Gadget
property.description: Styles the 'close' gadget that is added when no other control is provided to close an overlay.

property.title: Overlay Closing Speed
property.description: Speed in milliseconds for overlays to fade out. Default: 100.

property.title: Form Control Unit Label Width in Overlays
property.description: Defines the width of the label area to the left of form control units within overlays.

property.title: Form Width in Overlays
property.description: Controls the width of forms using the .xenForm class when being shown in an overlay.

property.title: Overlay Mask Opacity
property.description: Controls the degree of transparency of the mask applied to the background content when an overlay is shown. Default: 0.6; fully transparent: 0; fully opaque: 1.

property.title: General Overlay Container
property.description: This is the property that controls the main container for overlays, including their border and shadow etc.

property.title: Overlay Opening Speed
property.description: Speed in milliseconds for overlays to fade in. Default: 200.

property.title: Overlay Top Position
property.description: Default position of overlays relative to the top of the browser window.

property.title: Page Description
property.description: Styles the optional description text that may be presented below the page title.

property.title: PageNav Container
property.description: The container for the page navigation element, normally controls overall elements such as font size etc.

property.title: PageNav Current Page Link
property.description: These rules are applied in addition to the normal page link rules in order to distinguish the current page.

property.title: PageNav Item Link
property.description: Used to style each individual page navigation link including pages, next and previous buttons, and the scroll arrows.

property.title: PageNav / Link Group Container
property.description: This element is used in instances where a page navigation block is placed alongside a group of links, such as above the list of threads on the forum view, or above the list of messages on thread view.

property.title: PageNav Link Spacing
property.description: Controls the amount of space between individual page navigation links.

property.title: PageNav Link Width
property.description: This width is the basis for all page navigation links.

property.title: PageNav Page Link
property.description: Controls all page links.

property.title: PageNav Page Link, Hover State
property.description: Controls the appearance of page links when the mouse hovers over them.

property.title: PageNav Scroll Button
property.description: Controls the appearance of the scroll buttons that appear when more than seven pages are available.

property.title: Page Width Controller
Popup Control Arrow (closed)
property.description: Points down, indicates the menu can be opened

property.title: Popup Control Arrow (open)
property.description: Indicates that the menu can be closed

property.title: Popup Control (open)
property.description: Popup menu trigger elements

property.title: Popup Control (closed, hover)
property.description: Controls the appearance of popup controls as the mouse passes over them when the menu is closed.

property.title: Preview Tooltip
property.description: This defines the style of the element used for thread, and other content preview tooltips.

property.title: Preview Tooltip Arrow (Outer)
property.description: Styles the arrow attached to content preview tooltips that points to the content.

property.title: Primary Content
property.description: Most content uses this property

property.title: Primary Content Link
property.description: Styling for links within primaryContent containers.

property.title: Profile Page Container
property.description: Styles the outer container for the profile page elements.

property.title: Last Activity Text
property.description: Styles text that describes where the user was last active.

property.title: Sidebar Info Block
property.description: Controls the styling of the outer section of sidebar info blocks.

property.title: Sidebar Info Field Value
property.description: Styles the values for fields in sidebar info blocks.

property.title: Sidebar Info Field Name
property.description: Styles the labels for data in info blocks.

property.title: Sidebar Width
property.description: Specifies the width of the sidebar for the member profile page. This sidebar is usually the same width as the large avatar.

property.title: Tab
property.description: Styles the tabs at the top of the profile page.

property.title: Tab Height
property.description: Controls the height of the tabs on the profile page.

property.title: Tab, Hover State
property.description: Styles profile page tabs when hovered

property.title: Tab Inset
property.description: Controls the amount of indent from the notional left margin to the tabs area.

property.title: Tab, Selected State
property.description: Additional styling for the selected tab on the profile page.

property.title: User Status Text
property.description: Styles the text of the current user status message, if shown.

property.title: User Name
property.description: Styles the large heading showing the name of the person whose profile page this is.

property.title: Redirect Message Container
property.description: Styles the container for redirect messages that appear after some forms are submitted with AJAX.

property.title: Redirect Message Content
property.description: Styles the content of redirect messages shown after AJAX submissions.

property.title: Secondary Content
property.description: Secondary, or non-primary content

property.title: Secondary Content Link
property.description: Styling for links within secondaryContent containers.

property.title: Section
property.description: Wraps around most content.

property.title: Section Footer
property.description: Footnotes or summary for a section

property.title: Section Main
property.description: A specially emphasized version of 'Section'.

property.title: Sidebar
property.description: Controls the layout of the sidebar element.

property.title: User Status Tooltip
property.description: This styling is applied to tooltips showing user status messages, in addition to the regular tooltip styling.

property.title: User Status Tooltip Arrow
property.description: This styling is applied to user status message tooltip arrows, in addition to the regular tooltip arrow styling.

property.title: Sub-Heading
property.description: Smaller, more commonly-used headings

property.title: Sub-Heading, Hover State
property.description: Occasionally, sub-headings may be used as block-level links. In these cases, this property controls what happens to the sub-heading link on hover.

property.title: Tab
property.description: Controls the appearance of individual tabs in general tabbed interfaces.

property.title: Tab, Selected
property.description: Controls the appearance of the selected tab.

property.title: Tab, Hover State
property.description: Controls general tabs in their hover state.

property.title: Tabs Container
property.description: Controls the appearance of tabbed user interfaces other than those in the navigation bar.

property.title: Text Control
property.description: Styling to be applied to <input type="text" /> and <textarea> text-editing elements.

property.title: Text Control, Monospace / Code
property.description: Additional styling to be applied to text controls if they are to contain code rather than regular text.

style_properties.property: {"extra":"white-space: pre;\nword-wrap: normal;\ndirection: ltr;","font-family":"Consolas, \"Courier New\", Courier, monospace"}

property.title: Text Control, Disabled State
property.description: Additional styling to be applied to text controls in their disabled state.

property.title: Text Control, Focused State
property.description: Styling to be applied to text controls when they receive focus.

property.title: Textarea, Focused State
property.description: Additional styling to be applied to text controls when focused if they are multi-line textarea types.

property.title: Text-Heading
property.description: A minor heading

property.title: Show forum descriptions on thread list
property.description: Display text underneath the main page title.

property.title: Tooltip
property.description: The basic styling for all generic XenForo tooltips.

property.title: Tooltip Arrow
property.description: The extra arrow often shown with tooltips.

property.title: User-Generated Link
property.description: Styling for links posted in messages.

property.title: User Generated Link (hover)
property.description: Hovered user-generated links

property.title: Visitor Panel Avatar
property.description: Layout for the visitor panel. The image size is controlled by the @visitorPanelAvatarSize property.

property.title: Visitor Panel Username
property.description: The name of the logged-in visitor.

group.title: BB Code Elements
group.description: Controls the appearance of BB code elements within messages.

group.title: Breadcrumb
group.description: Controls the breadcrumb unit, which allows users to navigate back up to the site home page.

group.title: Buttons
group.description: Contains properties used to style the various types of buttons used by XenForo.

group.title: Color Palette
group.description: The set of colours used to build this style.

group.title: Discussion List
group.description: Controls the appearance of the list of discussions within a forum or a conversation etc.

group.title: Footer
group.description: Controls the bottom of the page

group.title: Forms
group.description: Defines the layout and style of most forms in XenForo.

group.title: Form-Type Overlays
group.description: Controls the appearance of form-type overlays and their contents.

group.title: General
group.description: General style settings for this style.

group.title: Header and Navigation
group.description: Controls the appearance of the header and navigation elements of all pages.

group.title: Login Bar
group.description: The drop-down login form.

group.title: Member List Item
group.description: Styles the blocks used for each member on the member list.

group.title: Member Profile Page
group.description: Style properties for pages showing detailed information about members.

group.title: Message Elements
group.description: Controls the content area of the full message template.

group.title: Message Layout
group.description: Controls the layout of the full-size message template.

group.title: Forum List
group.description: Controls the appearance of the list of forums, categories, pages etc.

group.title: Overlays and Tooltips
group.description: Styling for overlays and tooltips that allow content to be displayed on-top of regular page content.

group.title: PageNav, Link Groups and Tabs
group.description: Controls multi-page links, link groups and tabs other than those in the header.

group.title: Popup Menus
group.description: Styling for most popup menu elements can be found here.

group.title: Building Blocks
group.description: Controls building-block classes used for the vast majority of the XenForo interface.

group.title: Sidebar
group.description: Controls the XenForo sidebar and various elements that appear within it.
